price: 61. Allah sauvera ceux qui auront fait montre de piété en leur assurant le succès. Ils ne seront atteints d’aucun mal et ils n’auront aucune affliction.
arabic: وَيُنَجِّي ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلسُّوٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wayunajjī al-lahu alladhīna ittaqaw bimafāzatihim lā yamassuhumu al-sūu walā hum yaḥzanūna
